subject: Tour de France (Bicycle Race)
Vuelta a Espana (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: The 2010 Tour de France winner has struggled this year with both his performance and his health, and now he will miss the Tour this year because of a fractured pelvis.
snippet: The 2010 Tour de France winner has struggled this year with both his performance and his health, and now he will miss the Tour this year because of a fractured pelvis.
